Start: ^I Walk into my room, to go to bed.
^I hope into the shower real quick, and by the time I come out, Timothy is already curled up in his bed.

IntoBed: ^I plant myself in my own bed, and sqwirm under the sheets.
^I sit there, wavering between consiousness, and unconsiousness, when I hear a voice.
Question: ^[Timothy] "D-d-does it ever get easier?"
^[Timothy] "being here, I-I mean."

ContemplateWeek1: ^man, its going to be a bit weird, having a roommate
Sleep: ^I start to drift off from there. My thoughts slow and hazy.
^My dreams, if I had any, escape my memory, and the next thing I know, the suns in my eyes.
^I toss and turn, pained to be awake.
^I look over at my spare bed, and Timothy's still there.
^Slumberland becons me back to it, but I should be getting up about now.

c: ^I sigh, getting out of my cloth cocoon, and quickly get ready for the day. In no time, I'm ready to head out.
^I curl even deeper into lethargic bliss, and welcome the sweet unconcuiousness again.

g-0: ^Thanks for playing! This is the end of the build. We have no quit function, so please hit alt+F4 to close.
